lines.text: Who do I need to see?
Go and see Mr Eade.
Can you stop this madness?
Dont look at me, I'm just a plumber.
This is just terrible. Did he say anything to you, about how it happened?
He didn't have the breath.
Do you know what caused it?
The same as always. Digging for gold.
[producing King's helmet]
We found this down there.
It's King's. It's gold, I hate the lousy stuff.
[having knocked Kowalski cold]
Kowalski! Kowalski!
[slaps him]
KOWALSKI! The next time you touch a face darker than mine, you're out!

[referring to Steyner's geological report]
And you really believe this is fool-proof?
It's the work of experts.
That depends on what one thinks of experts, doesn't it?
And what do you think of experts, Mr. Slater?

[angrily]
Well, sometimes they're right and sometimes they're wrong, but they don't do the digging!
Dammit, Marais, you told me nothing could go wrong!
Someone must have been careless!
And if I've lost my general manager?
My God, you're beautiful.
Kiss me you fool.
Rod Slater, Do you know what your getting yourself into?
No, No I dont.
